footer.content: Arabica Gaming Hub service is an online one-versus-one platform which contains many small game where user could play only with other players over the internet. The service also has some mechanic to reward through weekly rewards and spin rewards.

login.desc: Join the game now to receive many attractive gifts.

event_main.text_d1: Fill in with 100 drops to collect water bucket.
event_main.text_d2: Three people which have collected the most water buckets by the end of the event will receive 1 smartphone OPPO 79 and 2 more U-money prizes.
event_main.text_d3: Letâ€™s play or buy more package now to get more drops and collect more buckets.

detail.title: Buonpimay Festival
detail.text_d2_2: 3 special prizes for the 3 luckiest people, including:
detail.text_d6_2: User will have to compete to see who can collect the most water buckets. Top 3 users will receive the 3 prizes mentioned above in turn. The winner will be determined after 23:59:59 on April 30, 2024. In case users accumulate the same number of water bottles, ranking will be calculated based on the number of drops of water in the water bottle which has been not full yet. In case the number of water drops in the unfinished water bottle is equal, ranking will be based on which user reaches that number of water drops the earliest. After campaign ends, system will update the winners and then Unitel will proactively contact the winner to proceed with the award according to normal regulations.
detail.text_d7_2: Let see the water bucket in the middle of the screen. It shows the number of drops you are accumulating. Try to fill the water tank with 100 water drops. You can earn more drops by winning or buying packages.

rank.name: Nickname
rank.drop: Number of drops in the current bucket

result.top_1: Congrats! You have excellently won 1st place and get 01 OPPO A79 for free. Unitel will contact you soon to give you your reward.
result.top_2: Congrats! You have excellently won 2nd place and get 1,000,000 kip Umoney for free. Unitel will contact you soon to give you your reward.
result.top_3: Congrats! You have excellently won 3rd place and get 500,000 kip Umoney for free. Unitel will contact you soon to give you your reward
result.all: The Buonpimay event has ended. Congratulations to our 3 winners!
result.page: Buonpimay event has ended. Above is the list of users who won prizes from this offer. Please continue to experience and look forward to upcoming Campaigns from Arabica!
